Ilunion Barcelona

Hotel Ilunion is located in the most modern and avant-garde area of the city, which makes the hotel an ideal choice for business travel.

This magnificent 4-star hotel in Barcelona stands out thanks to its contemporary design: the robust building, with high ceilings, combines urban materialas with steel and glass panelling. It has 224 rooms with an innovative design and equipped with all kinds of amenities.

The hotel features a rooftop swimming pool, from where you will enjoy stunning views of the city. The beach is juts 10 minutes away, as are numerous restaurants to delight the most exacting palates.

Location: Barcelona
